meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Elizabeth Costello Carmela Izzo Kate Waits Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #728.

td.p: Elizabeth Costello, a program analyst from Syracuse, New York
Carmela Izzo, a caterer from Brooklyn, New York
Kate Waits, a law professor from Albany, New York (whose 1-day cash winnings total $14,201)

tr.td: MAMMALS
MONEY
MUSIC
MEDICINES
MARTIAL ARTS
MISS MANNERS
